mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) count FROM cy_user y LEFT JOIN cy_user r ON y.invite_uid = r.uid WHERE 1=1

SELECT y.id, y.black, y.label_id lableId, y.uid, r.nick_name uidNickName, y.nick_name nickName, y.user_avatar userAvatar, y.user_sign userSign, y.user_mobile userMobile, y.user_type userType, y.wc_user_name wcUserName, y.wc_nick_name wcNickName, y.invite_uid inviteUid, y.wc_qr_code wcQrCode, y.last_login_time lastLoginTime, y.created_time createdTime, y.update_time updateTime, y.STATUS, y.ali_user_name aliUserNamee, y.ali_nick_name aliNickName, y.ali_userid aliUserid, y.vip_level vipLevel, y.cy_score_count cyScoreCount, y.cy_score_balance cyScoreBalance, y.balance, y.NAME, y.cid, y.cid_url cidUrl, y.is_real_name isRealName, y.is_real_mobile isRealMobile FROM cy_user y LEFT JOIN cy_user r ON y.invite_uid = r.uid WHERE 1 = 1
LIMIT #{begin},#{end}
